review_data.title: Immer wieder sehr zufrieden
review_data.content: Das Mythos ist von aussen betrachtet ein eher unscheinbares Restaurant am Stauffacher. Verkehrstechnisch nahezu perfekter gelegen, mit kleiner aber feiner...More

review_data.title: Awesome with good prices
review_data.content: Great restaurant near HB main station, with great Greek food and many traditional drinks to choose. If you are a Greek food lover then you have to visit it. Highly recommended.

review_data.title: Ouzo with a smile
review_data.content: Ideally located near the busy tram junction of Stauffacher, the small Mythos café-snackbar is a place, where I like to go once in a while with Swiss philhellene friends of mine for an ouzo or two before dinner at a more upmarket restaurant. They have...More

review_data.title: The proper thing
review_data.content: I was visiting some friends in Zurich for some days and I was waiting for them at the Stauffacher tram station, when suddenly a Swiss couple carrying paper bags came and sat on a bench next to me. The opened the bags and started eating....More

review_data.title: nettes Restaurant
review_data.content: Nettes kleines Restaurant in der Nähe von Stauffacher. Leckeres Essen, nette Bedienung. Hat uns sehr gut gefallen!

review_data.title: Leckeres Poulet-Pita
review_data.content: Kleines Lokal an zentraler Lage (Stauffacher, Zürich) mit sehr freundlichem Personal. Drinnen ist es eher laut. Poulet-Pita (Pitabrot gefüllt mit...More

review_data.title: Proper Gyros
review_data.content: I've been coming here for years when I want a proper gyros and a nice half litre of Malamatina or Kechribari retsina. I've been eating gyros all over Greece since my first one in Nafplion in 1984 and I've had some rubbish ones I can...More

review_data.title: Great Greek food, amazing value for money
review_data.content: Considering how expensive Zurich is, I would say this restaurant has the best value for money you can find. Great food with rather low price (don't forget the fact that you're in Zurich). I also really like the atmosphere here. You can easily sit here...More

review_data.title: Good food for a reasonable price
review_data.content: Came here for a quick dinner and was pretty happy with what I got. I had the pita and my friend had the large dinner plate. Both were tasty, decent size and the service was good. Will come back.

review_data.title: Average food, almost greek!
review_data.content: Average food, not really Greek! The meat is cooked too much. I would expect from a Greek restaurant in Zürich a lot more. Not a bad option for lunch or a casual dinner.

review_data.title: Klein, aber fein ! Ein Top Griecher

review_data.title: Good food and reasonably priced
review_data.content: Stopped by for dinner and was pleasantly surprised. Pita and Brochettes all very good, easily most reasonably priced meal we had in Zurich.

review_data.title: Top

review_data.title: Buonissima pita greca!

review_data.title: Great, authentic food
review_data.content: A very casual place with delicious food. We often have lunch here as the food is always great and the price very reasonable.

review_data.title: Just disappointing!
review_data.content: Ordered through eat.ch for delivery service. They cancelled the order even if they accepted the order in the beginning, never contacted me and after waiting for my order after 2 hours, I had to solve they issue myself. NEVER AGAIN!!!

review_data.title: not as good as it used to be

review_data.title: Authentic greek
review_data.content: Come here for simple authentic home cook Greek meals! Nothing fancy on the atmosphere but the food is just good, especially Pita-gyros.

review_data.title: Best Greek in town
review_data.content: We visit them on a monthly basis to get our dose of excellent Greek food!This place can be recommended to Greeks who miss their home as well as everyone else who loves authentic Greek food!we also tested the other Greek places in Zurich but Mythos...More

review_data.title: Good little Greek foodplace.
review_data.content: Mythos is a rather small place with easy Greek food. Been here about 10 times for lunch and the familiar faces are all Greek. The place inside is quite uncharming, so if that is why you want to come here, stop reading. The atmosphere is...More

review_data.title: einer der besten griechischen Imbisse in Zürich

review_data.title: Felt like being back home!
review_data.content: Excellent! Delicious! It is a must if you are in the city! Gyros + Bifteki combined with tyrokafteri simply amazing! Very friendly staff and nice atmosphere!

review_data.title: I could eat there every day !
